name: dataset_builder
description: AI-powered dataset builder that creates curated data collections using Exa Websets with custom criteria and enrichments
example_usage:
```python
from ai_agents.dataset_builder import build_dataset, build_company_dataset

async def main():
    # Build a general dataset
    dataset = await build_dataset(
        topic="AI startups",
        entity_type="company",
        target_count=100
    )
    print(f"Dataset created: {dataset.name}")
    print(f"Items collected: {dataset.status.items_found}")
    print(f"Export URL: {dataset.export_url}")
    
    # Build a specialized company dataset
    fintech_dataset = await build_company_dataset(
        industry="fintech",
        criteria=["Series A or later funding", "B2B focus"]
    )
```
post_add_instructions:
You can now import the dataset builder with `from ai_agents.dataset_builder import build_dataset`. Make sure to set your EXA_API_KEY and OPENAI_API_KEY environment variables.

The agent provides:
1. `build_dataset()` - General dataset building with custom criteria
2. `build_company_dataset()` - Specialized for company data
3. `build_research_dataset()` - Academic papers and research
4. `build_market_dataset()` - Market analysis data

Datasets are built asynchronously using Exa Websets. You can monitor progress in real-time or let it run in the background. For optional tracing, install lilypad: `pip install lilypad`.
